briefTitle: Single vs Double Umbilical Cord Blood Transplants in Children With High Risk Leukemia and Myelodysplasia (BMT CTN 0501)
officialTitle: Multi-center, Open Label, Randomized Trial Comparing Single Versus Double Umbilical Cord Blood (UCB) Transplantation in Pediatric Patients With High Risk Leukemia and Myelodysplasia (BMT CTN #0501)

interventions.name: Single Umbilical Cord Blood Unit Transplant
Double Umbilical Cord Blood Unit Transplant

summary: This study is a Phase III, randomized, open-label, multi-center, prospective study of single umbilical cord blood (UCB) transplantation versus double UCB transplantation in pediatric patients with hematologic malignancies.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Overall Survival
